Articles.Content: There was some invisible cliffs that crushes ship often when we try to land on,, are they still there?

Is it wrong that i read this as "is poi still bugged".

 

Sadly, no answer for you OP, never visited.

Last time I went to Pol I didn't have any unexpected explosions but I've learned to be cautious and descend at a very slow pace...  It's pretty easy to test out moon landings now with the orbit editor built right into the troubleshooting menu (Alt+F12).

Jett

Pol is fine.

I've done low and high orbits, landed my lander, hopped it around, jetpacked around, planted flags and landed the mothership too. No problems.

(Jool-5 story is found here)
So it has been fixed? Thats cool  Did my Jool-5 back in 1.0.5... Heres my mining lander, floating about 500m above the ground (and falling) after an longer EVA trip
